name: Jksidhu.GitHub.io
body:
### My Experience.
1. Google Analytics Consultant – Oct. 2015 - current      
	- SocialMediaHQ.com (thought leadership blog) – consulting on launch strategies, planning data collection strategy and analysis goals, and implementing/monitoring Google Analytics for the website.  
	- KM Digital Relations (digital agency) - Worked on a project regarding strategies, tactics, and best practices for effective social media campaigns and UTM parameter tagging in Google Analytics.     

2. Digital Analyst & Affiliate Marketing Program Manager, Data Analysis Internship – Oct. 2014 – Sept. 2015
Jako Enterprises, Philadelphia, PA       
	- Analyzed website’s data across multiple channels and provided actionable reports on a weekly basis to digital team, managers, and VP.  Provided insights on KPI metrics, UX design, products, and financial analysis in the following fields: Digital marketing, Product, Web design/content, Consumer relations, and Logistics.      
	- Used Google Analytics on a daily basis to monitor and explore website engagement. Debugged any issues.
	- Implemented and managed website’s Google Tag Manager account and data collection strategy.
	- Managed website’s Linkshare Affiliate program. Designed campaigns alongside graphic designer.
	- Conducted A/B testing for marketing e-mails, web designs, and web conversion funnels.     
*Achievements:      
	- Increased affiliate channel sales from 25-30% to 35-40% of website’s total revenue.
	- Built and designed website data dashboard. Website performed 30-50% above sales plan for four consecutive months. Helped reduce digital marketing costs from 15% cost/sale to 10% cost/sale.     

3. Marketing Internship – Jul. 2012 – Oct. 2012
The Blockley, Philadelphia, PA
	- Created, planned, and measured social media posts using Hoot Suite.
	- Updated and edited website content weekly. Interviewed artists, published interviews and artist descriptions.
	- Conducted market research to help create promotions, and plan events. Expanded e-mail database.
	- Drafted press releases for upcoming events to be sent to live music news providers.



### Skills     
Google Analytics IQ Certification, MS Excel 2013 Advanced Certification, Google Tag Manager, Adobe Analytics, Omniture, data analytics, data visualization, A/B testing, hypothesis testing, multivariate testing, financial analytics, sentiment analysis, keyword analysis, SEO, KPI dashboards, market segmentation, cross-channel attribution, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Dynamics RMS, Tableau, basic HTML, basic JavaScript, Rakuten Linkshare, client relations, digital advertising, social media optimization, Hoot Suite, Wordpress, Magento CMS, sales forecasting, Nielsen terminology

### Education    
Temple University, School of Media and Communication     
Bachelor of Arts (B.A.), Strategic Communication     
Minors: General Business, Physics     


### Relevant Coursework      
Data Science, Intro to Internet/Web Studies, The Media Business, News Writing, Media Information Gathering and Evaluation, Economics, Global Communication and Leadership, Integrated Marketing Communication, Marketing Management, Financial Accounting, Physics, Statistics

### Leadership Activities     
1. Bi-Partisan Net Neutrality Student Organization – Apr. 2014 – Dec. 2014       
	- Served as president and founder of organization, drafted constitution for organization.
	- Designed/produced website: www.studentsfornetneutrality.weebly.com  
	- Involved in blogging, social media marketing, on-air marketing, public relations, event planning.
	- Appeared On-Air correspondence with local policymakers on Media Inside Out, Temple Television Cable Network TV Channel. Episode YouTube Video: http://templetv.net/shows/media-insideout/media-inside-out-episode-10/        

2. LeaderShape Institute - May 2014       
	- 1 of 60 selected graduates to participate in 1 week long leadership conference involving vision exploration, quality assurance training, interpersonal communication, and team building exercises.       

3. National Business Fraternity Phi Beta Lambda- Jun. 2009 – May 2012
	- Served as Vice President of Public Relations and Award Ceremony Host for Region 8 PA.
	- Served as Secretary of local chapter.
	- Awarded 3rd place in regional competition for business procedures.


### Volunteer Work     
	-Special Olympics Pennsylvania – Apr. 2015

	-Tang Soo Do Assistant Instructor – Mar 2009- Aug. 2009
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
